pullRequest.title: Added new APIs for querying the status of backup and restore operations in Key Vault backup clients.
pullRequest.bodyText:
Addresses #15055.
Added unit tests and recordings as well.

commit.message: Added new APIs for checking the status of backup and restore operations.
Added tests for the new status APIs.

nodes.bodyText: assuming this is blocking, should we let the backupStatusPoller do the initial polling?
